description: This 2 USB Port 2100mA Travel Wall Charger is a versatile powerful and reliable charger. It is convenient, powerful, safe, easy to use, and compatible with most tablet and mobile phone devices, including iPad, iPhone, iPod, smartphones, cell phones, MP3, MP4 players, game devices, GPS devices, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, Kindle devices, Nook Color, Google Nexus Tablet, and most tablet devices. With high-quality and sturdy engineering, this charger is a must have in your home and for your travel.SpecificationsInput: AC 110-240VOutput: 5V, 2.1A, 10WPort 1: 5V, 2100mAPort 2: 5V, 1000mACompatibilityThis 2 USB Port 2100mA Wall Charger is a versatile and powerful FAST Wall charger you will ever need. It is convenient, powerful, safe, easy to use, and compatible with Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD/HDX, Kindle devices, Nook Color, Google Nexus Tablet, and most tablets. (NOT compatible with Microsoft Surface)Manufacture Limited WarrantyThis iXCC (tm) product is offered with limited manufacture warranty.The limited warranty period for the Product extends forONE (1) YEARfrom the date of purchase.
title: iXCC ® Dual USB 2.1 Amp [10 Watt] White FAST AC Travel Wall Charger with Lightning Cable
